titleStmt.title: Sermons preached before his Maiestie 1. The bridegromes banquet. 2. The triumph of constancie. 3. The banishment of dogges. By Francis Rollenson, Batcheler of Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Rollenson, Francis, ca. 1565-1630.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Snodham for Robert Iackson, and are to be solde at his shop in Fleet-streete, ouer against the Conduit,

notesStmt.note: This edition bound with STC 20775: Rawlinson, John. The Romish Judas (London, 1611).
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
